purpose: To present the movie theatre's program effectiveness and results
title: Movie Theatre Organization
layout: Three-column layout with highlights on results

situation.title: Situation
situation.content: Movie theatre organization wanted to understand how their guests’ behavior changed after enrollment in their rewards program.
bullets: Compare guest spending behavior pre- and post program enrollment
Accurately assess the program, despite its apparent success

approach.title: Approach
approach.content: Utilizing proprietary spending data and analytical solutions:
bullets: Looked at loyalty members and analyzed their spend pre- and post program enrollment
Ascertained spend metrics with the movie theatre including: average ticket, average frequency and customer loyalty

results.title: Results
results.additional_text: Ability to calculate a more accurate program ROI and overall ‘customer value’

design_language: Corporate with emphasis on orange accents

_additional_info._why_unknown: Font details are not specified in the image.
